EmailTemplate.name: Global_Nurture_Jetwave_BGA.201708_Global_Email_Jetwave_BGA_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Wondering What Inflight Wi-Fi Solution You Need? Honeywell Has Your Answer. ✈️
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Let Honeywell Be Your Connectivity Partner <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pi9KZRAjkPU]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Why shop all over the globe for your connectivity hardware and services when Honeywell does it all? Honeywell solves the connectivity conundrum by offering our market-leading inflight connectivity systems, like JetWave <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/products/safety-and-connectivity/jetwave-high-speed-satellite-communications-hardware]]>, and GoDirect Cabin Connectivity services <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pi9KZRAjkPU]]> to bring operators the best airborne Wi-Fi that meet their needs. Let us help you find the right option.
READY TO GET CONNECTED? <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally]]>
